title: Question 18
prompt:
Sentence 6: You are familiar with my qualifications, and in addition to the experience on my résumé, I brought enthusiasm and commitment to this position.

Which is the best way to write the underlined portion of this sentence? If the original is the best way, choose option (A).
description: Click the <u>one best answer</u> to each question.
feedback:
The verb brought is in the past tense. However, the writer does not already have the position, so he or she could not have already brought enthusiasm and commitment. The writer is projecting into the future and saying that, if he or she is awarded the job, he or she will bring enthusiasm and commitment. The future tense will bring is correct.
You are familiar with my qualifications, and in addition to the experience on my résumé, Iwill bring enthusiasm and commitment to this position.
